title: Sweet Singapore CMs
synopsis:
As part of "Made in Singapore," a global promotional event designed to rekindle passion for travel to Singapore, the Singapore Tourism Board has partnered with Naver Webtoon to present "Sweet Singapore Season 2," a Singapore-themed webtoon.

"Made in Singapore" highlights Singapore's iconic tourist attractions and hidden gems, showcasing how ordinary moments in Singapore transform into extraordinary experiences.

"Sweet Singapore Season 2" consists of two episodes: "Nice Singapore Time," a sequel to Kim Jin's popular "Nice Gin Time," and "Singapore Fingers," a sequel to Han Gap-gyeong's beloved youth webtoon "Spirit Fingers."

(Source: Official website, Google translated)
